item.title: Roblox: Kai's MM2 Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
There are many Murder Mystery titles on the Roblox platform. And one of the most exciting ones is Kai's MM2 . As always, you have to hide or hunt for the Killer. Or, if you are lucky enough, you can even take on the role of the Killer. In this case, you will need a good weapon, and Kai's MM2 codes can help you with this.

By redeeming these Roblox codes, players can get various rewards, including Coins and weapons. However, you must hurry to use them, as they are active for a limited time.

All Kai's MM2 Codes

Working Kai's MM2 Codes

  • CRYSTAL7000 - Redeem this Code to get a Crystal Heat
  • LIKES1000 - Redeem this Code to get a Toxic Icebreaker

Expired Kai's MM2 Codes

  • LIKEGOAL15K
  • BATTLEAXE
  • ICEPIERCER
  • SWIRLY
  • MILESTONE10M
  • GRINCH
  • ICEBREAKER
  • LASER
  • HALLOW
  • BAT30THOUSAND
  • ST34MPUNK
  • 10KBALL
  • GOAL3000
  • HALLOWEEN2023
  • VISITS1MIL

If you have the role of Killer or Sheriff, then you will have access to weapons during the match. At first, the default knife and gun are pretty good. But after 10 matches, you will want to replenish your arsenal. This can be done by using Coins or Kai's MM2 codes.

Most of them will reward you with new weapons. In addition, these are often unique items that cannot be obtained in any other way. Therefore, you must use Kai's MM2 codes before they expire.

How to Redeem Kai's MM2 Codes

Luckily, players can redeem Kai's MM2 codes just like in other Roblox titles. But if you get confused, then follow these simple steps to get free goodies:

  • Launch Kai's MM2 .
  • Then, open your inventory by clicking on the crate icon on the left side of the screen.
  • In the lower right part of the window that opens, enter one of the codes and click the Redeem button.
  • If you do everything correctly, you will see a message about receiving your reward. We also recommend copying and pasting codes, as Kai's MM2 is case-sensitive.

How to Get More Kai's MM2 Codes

Developers quite often add new codes to Kai's MM2 . So, if you don't want to miss them, you should follow this guide. As with Slouse's MM2 Codes guide, we will be updating it from time to time. Alternatively, players can subscribe to the official developer page so as not to miss news, updates, and, of course, new codes:

  • Kai's MM2 Discord Server
  • Аscend Roblox Group

item.title: Roblox: Ultimate Soccer Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Ultimate Soccer is an exciting Football Simulator on the Roblox platform in which everyone can feel like a collector and a professional football player. In this game, you must participate in soccer matches, upgrade your skills, and open packs to replenish your accessories collection. But if you are a beginner player and have not had an opportunity to accumulate a lot of money or items, Ultimate Soccer codes will help improve the situation.

Using codes, you can get unique accessories unavailable from packs, decent amounts of in-game currency, and even luck boosters. So, no matter your experience in the game, you should take advantage of this freebie.

All Ultimate Soccer Codes

Working Ultimate Soccer Codes

  • BOOST - Enter this code to get 2x EXP Boost (15 minutes).
  • FOLLOWERS - Enter this code to get 20,000 Cash and 2x Cash Boost (15 minutes).
  • NEWUPDATE - Enter this code to get x2,500 Cash and x2 Resets.

Expired Ultimate Soccer Codes

  • RELEASED

As you immerse yourself in Ultimate Soccer , you will quickly fall in love with this game for its dynamic cooperative gameplay and the excitement experienced when opening the next reward pack. But such gameplay can get boring just as quickly, and the developers understand this. Therefore, like other games on Roblox servers, the creators of Ultimate Soccer sometimes share codes to whet the fans' interest. As we said earlier, codes can bring you plenty of rewards, but they have a limited expiration date, so hurry up to get all the rewards.

How to Redeem Ultimate Soccer Codes

Fortunately for football fans, like most simulators on Roblox , the ability to redeem code in Ultimate Soccer is available from the first seconds of gameplay. Here's how to do it:

  • Launch Ultimate Soccer in Roblox .
  • Click on the Codes icon at the bottom of the screen.
  • Enter the code in the Enter Code text box.
  • Click Redeem, and you will receive your rewards.

How to Get More Ultimate Soccer Codes

New codes appear with holidays and events, after global updates, or as an apology for an in-game error. However, unlike many Roblox games, the developers of Ultimate Soccer do not leave a list of new codes in the game description, which makes the search a little more difficult for beginners. The easiest way to learn about all the codes is to visit our guide periodically. But if you want to know about all the in-game rewards and secrets before everyone else, you can subscribe to the official developer pages:

  • Twitter
  • Discord
  • Roblox

item.title: Roblox: Angelaz's MM2 Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Angelaz's Murder Mystery 2 is a fun Roblox game where you must survive or kill, depending on your role. At the beginning of the game, you become a sheriff, a killer, or an innocent. The murderer has to kill everyone, and the innocents have to run away or hide from him. The sheriff, meanwhile, has to find the killer and neutralize them. There is also another rare role – Traitor, and to play it, you need to kill but hide it.

Different maps and weapons affect the gameplay, and you can get the latter for free. Redeem Angelaz's MM2 codes and get a bunch of swords and guns.

All Angelaz's MM2 Codes

Working Angelaz's MM2 Codes

  • SW0RD - Enter this code to get Darksword.
  • FUTURE - Enter this code to get Future Laser.
  • CWAVES - Enter this code to get Ocean.
  • K3Y - Enter this code to get Mystery Key.
  • EGUN - Enter this code to get Rainbow.
  • SH0T - Enter this code to get Darkshot.
  • ICE - Enter this code to get Icecrusher.
  • WAVES - Enter this code to get Waves.
  • SEER - Enter this code to get Seer Axe.
  • LAVA - Enter this code to get Lava Hammer.
  • GREEN - Enter this code to get Green Heat.
  • COCEAN - Enter this code to get Waves.
  • SEASON4 - Enter this code to get 500 Coins.
  • OCEAN - Enter this code to get Ocean.
  • G0LD3N - Enter this code to get Golden Gasp.
  • BEACH - Enter this code to get Rainbow Beach.
  • BLU3CU4LASS - Enter this code to get Blue Cutlass.
  • EV1L - Enter this code to get Evil Eternal.
  • FR33CHROMA - Enter this code to get Chroma Nightblade.
  • IC3 - Enter this code to get Icepiercer.
  • EKNIFE - Enter this code to get Rainbow.

Expired Angelaz's MM2 Codes

  • BLESSED

In Angelaz's MM2 , the most crucial thing is weapons, of which there are many. The cool thing is that you can get more than ten weapons for free by redeeming Angelaz's MM2 codes. The list of working codes is above.

How to Redeem Codes in Angelaz's MM2

If you have played other Roblox games, redeeming Angelaz's MM2 codes will be easy. However, if you are a beginner, the interface may be a bit confusing. In fact, it is not complicated, and with our guide, you can redeem Angelaz's MM2 codes with ease.

  • Open Roblox and launch Angelaz's MM2 .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Click the Inventory button in the form of a box.
  • The Inventory window has a field in the lower right corner. Paste the code from our list of active codes into it and click Redeem.

How to Get More Angelaz's MM2 Codes

Just like with other Roblox experiences, the best way to get new active codes is to bookmark this page, as we are constantly updating it. However, you can also find codes on the Olivias MM2 Youtube channel and the Murder Mystery Community Discord channel.

item.title: Draconia Saga Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Draconia Saga is an RPG, which means you will have a choice of classes, various builds, and many quests. Although there are already many similar mobile games in this genre, Draconia Saga still has something to surprise you. One of the original features of the game is the Dancer class, which will defeat enemies using a beautiful dance with the power of music. The game world, Drakites, and characters are drawn in a high-quality, beautiful cartoon style that can compete even with some PC games.

Of course, in Draconia Saga , you have to farm a lot of currency and items to progress through the game. F2P players may find it a bit difficult, so be sure to redeem Draconia Saga codes to get some freebies.

All Draconia Saga Codes

Working Draconia Saga Codes

  • UPI666 - Enter this code to get 300 Lazulites.
  • WEL0516 - Enter this code to get 10x Drakite Summon Ticket.
  • JUB516 - Enter this code to get 5x Lollipop and 10x Decor Gacha Coin.
  • MINO516 - Enter this code to get Rewards 100k Silver and 3x Drakite Summon Ticket.
  • DS0518 - Enter this code to get 5x Dia`s Snackbag.
  • JOVA516 - Enter this code to get 100k Silver and 3x Drakite Summon Ticket.
  • ADK516 - Enter this code to get 300 Lazulites.

Expired Draconia Saga Codes

  • ELD516

It can be challenging to progress in mobile games, but codes partially fix this situation. Thanks to Draconia Saga codes, you will receive a lot of in-game currency and items that can summon and improve Drakites. You can find all Draconia Saga codes in the list above.

How to Redeem Codes in Draconia Saga

Redeeming codes is straightforward in most mobile games, and Draconia Saga is no exception. All you need to do is go to the settings. However, newcomers to this game may need clarification on the interface and extra help. Fortunately, we have created a detailed guide where you will learn how to redeem Draconia Saga codes.

  • Launch D raconia Saga and complete the tutorial.
  • Pay attention to the top-right corner of the screen. Below the mini-map, you will find the Functions button.
  • After that, go to Settings.
  • In the next window, go to the Account tab.
  • Now tap the Pack Exchange button.
  • In the field, enter or paste a code from our list of active codes.
  • Press Exchange.

Remember that codes may become inactive after a while. To avoid losing rewards, redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Draconia Saga Codes

Codes can help you complete different mobile games, but unfortunately, they can be hard to find. To avoid missing out on free rewards, bookmark this page in your browser. We update it regularly so you can get all the active codes. If you need additional sources of information, here are the official web resources of the developers:

  • Draconia Saga Facebook page
  • Draconia Saga Discord channel

Draconia Saga is available on PC and mobile devices.
